text: Dulmih miyyi gacaah? Yallih masaagidil Yallih migaq cusaanaah Salat elle Abaanamak Sinam waasaah tet digloo kee tet Baysiyyah yangayyee marak num magaca, woo mari masaagid culam mafaxximtaay keenih maxiqta digaalak meesitak culan ken akke waytek, usun Addunyal mangacannaa kee wacarriysiyya loonuuh akeeral kaxxa digaala- lon
